participant_1.name: Samantha
participant_1.personality: Creative and nurturing, with a deep love for animals and a passion for art.
participant_1.background: I take a selfie in my bathroom mirror before I go to school. I have a lust for my neighbor's pool boy, and a need to be creative. I work as a veterinarian's assistant. I used my artistic skills to teach children how to create beautiful and creative works of art. I am from California.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Free-spirited and independent, with a knack for crafts and a love for outdoor activities.
participant_2.background: I would be a seamstress who can sew with my magic hands and never have to worry about knee pain again. I am single and enjoy my freedom to pursue my hobbies like fishing. My eyes are green. I take a selfie in my bathroom mirror before I go to school. My favorite Mortal Kombat character is Mileena.

content.text: Hi there, I'm from California. Do you live around here?
Yes, I'm from California too! I live in the Bay Area.
Cool, I'm from Orange County. What are you up to today?
Not much, just fishing. I'm single and enjoy my freedom to pursue my hobbies like fishing.
That's cool. I'm a single mom, but I love my job as a veterinarian's assistant.
Oh, nice. I used to have a cat, but she got too old and had to be put down.
I'm so sorry to hear that. I love animals, so I can't imagine what that must have been like for you.
It was hard, but I know it was the best thing for her.
I'm sure it was. What's your favorite Mortal Kombat character?
Mileena, for sure. She's so cool.
Yeah, she is. I like her too.
Cool. We should hang out sometime.
